title: The profanity filter is not off in game but it is in game(I have tried many solutions)
body:
this bug has been going on for 2 patches  where my profanity filter is off in the client but still censored in game chat and has been very annoying i tried the set filter from 1 to 0 trick, i tried the legacy client trick but nothing works please help 

and i want the filter off not on

replies.body: Seen this reported a few times, and it seems like the toggle is not saving within the config folder.  Since that didn't work for you, reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We'll look into your specific issue individually to see what's up.  We'll get back to you!

Everyone I've played with, myself included, has this issue. We don't really care to much about it, but it's annoying when you're playing with friends (telling jokes and the like during the match) and the **** shows up. 

Not that big of an issue, though I would like to have it fixed. 
Thanks!
